pdf-pager.TitleMenusActor: PDF Codes to open Actor from context Menu
pdf-pager.TitleMenusItem: PDF Codes to open Item from context Menu
pdf-pager.PageOffset.Label: Page Offset
pdf-pager.Code.Label: PDF Code
pdf-pager.Error.NoPDFWithCode: Unable to find PDF with specified code.
pdf-pager.Error.FailedLoadPage: Failed to load page for PDF with specified code.
pdf-pager.Warning.ThingDeleted: '{name}' displayed in an open PDF Page has been deleted
pdf-pager.alwaysLoadPdf.Name: Immediately Display PDF
pdf-pager.alwaysLoadPdf.Hint: When checked, then PDFs will be immediately displayed when their page is selected, removing the need to press the 'Load PDF' button
pdf-pager.dropPdfLink.Name: Create @PDF link on drop
pdf-pager.dropPdfLink.Hint: When a journal PDF page is dropped into another document, create a @PDF[journalname#pagename|page=1]{pagename} link instead of a @UUID link
pdf-pager.formFillPdf.Name: Support Form-Fillable PDFs
pdf-pager.formFillPdf.Hint: Enable the use of Form-Fillable PDFs as an alternative to Actor sheets
pdf-pager.actorConfig.Name: Field Mappings for Actors
pdf-pager.actorConfig.Hint: Define a Javascript object that contains a mapping between PDF field and ACTOR field, such as: { "Character_Name" : "name", "health" : "system.health.hp" }
pdf-pager.itemConfig.Name: Field Mappings for Items
pdf-pager.itemConfig.Hint: Define a Javascript object that contains a mapping between PDF field and ITEM field, such as: { "Name" : "name", "health" : "system.health.hp" }
pdf-pager.hideFieldBg.Name: Hide Editable Field BG
pdf-pager.hideFieldBg.Hint: Disable the setting of an explicit background colour for editable fields (overrides a default PDFJS styling)
pdf-pager.hideFieldBorder.Name: Hide Editable Field Border
pdf-pager.hideFieldBorder.Hint: Disable the box that is drawn around editable fields (overrides a default PDFJS styling)
pdf-pager.editableAnnotations.Name: Allow Annotations on PDF Pages
pdf-pager.editableAnnotations.Hint: Allows players with ownership permission to add INK and TEXT annotations on top of normal PDF pages. The annotations are stored on the JournalEntryPage so are viewable by any player viewing that PDF page
pdf-pager.noSpellCheck.Name: Disable Spell Checking
pdf-pager.noSpellCheck.Hint: When checked, spell checking will be disabled within editable fields of PDFs
pdf-pager.readPdfFields.Name: Read Fields from PDF
pdf-pager.readPdfFields.Hint: When enabled, when a PDF is opened, any field data (annotations) within the loaded file are copied to the corresponding Actor field OVERWRITING any old values stored on the Actor (editing of the PDF is disabled while this option is enabled)
pdf-pager.ignoreBookmarkZoom.Name: Ignore Zoom in Bookmarks
pdf-pager.ignoreBookmarkZoom.Hint: Always ignore the zoom configured in the PDF's own bookmarks
pdf-pager.maxTocDepth.Name: Maximum Nesting of TOC
pdf-pager.maxTocDepth.Hint: The maximum nesting of the table of contents in the left sidebar of a Journal Page
pdf-pager.defaultZoom.Name: Default Zoom
pdf-pager.defaultZoom.Hint: Choose the preferred default zoom setting to be used when opening a PDF (fixed-value requires setting the next parameter)
pdf-pager.hideToolbar.Name: Hide PDF browser toolbar
pdf-pager.hideToolbar.Hint: Hides the PDF browser toolbar when editing form fillable PDFs
pdf-pager.showMapTooltips.Name: Show Mapping Tooltips
pdf-pager.showMapTooltips.Hint: Adds a tooltip to each field on an fillable PDF displayed as an Actor/Item sheet indicating the name of the PDF field as well as the field in the Actor/Item to which it is mapped (if any)
pdf-pager.showFieldMenus.Name: Edit Field Mapping
pdf-pager.showFieldMenus.Hint: Replaces each editable field with a drop-down menu from which can be selected a field in the Actor/Item. (If a field is already configured to use getter/setter functions, then the field is not editable.)
pdf-pager.showTitleBarButtons.Name: Show Buttons in Sheet Title Bar
pdf-pager.showTitleBarButtons.Hint: When checked, display helpful buttons in the title bar of Actor/Item PDF Sheets
pdf-pager.showGmButtons.Name: Show GM buttons in Title Bar
pdf-pager.showGmButtons.Hint: Show 'Log PDF Fields' and 'Inspect Data' buttons in title bar
pdf-pager.autoScrollToc.Name: Scroll TOC automatically
pdf-pager.autoScrollToc.Hint: When the view in the PDF is changed, automatically scroll the journal's TOC to ensure the current view is visible

labelClickableColor.Name: Color for Clickable Text
labelClickableColor.Hint: Define the backgound colour for labels which are clickable (It should have a low alpha)

labelHoverColor.Name: Hover Color for Clickable Text
labelHoverColor.Hint: Define the background colour when hovering over clickable text (It should have a low alpha)

labelClickColor.Name: Click Color for Clickable Text
labelClickColor.Hint: Define the background colour when clicking on clickable text (It should have a low alpha)

ChoosePdfForm.Title: Choose PDF for '{name}'
ChoosePdfForm.Hint: Choose the PDF to be used for this specific Actor

pdf-pager.defaultSpread.Name: Default Spread
pdf-pager.defaultSpread.Hint: Set an explicit spread mode to be used when viewing PDFs
pdf-pager.defaultScroll.Name: Default Scroll
pdf-pager.defaultScroll.Hint: Set an explicit scroll mode to be used when viewing PDFs
pdf-pager.zoomPercentage.Name: Default Zoom Fixed Percentage
pdf-pager.zoomPercentage.Hint: The default zoom (as a percentage) when Default Zoom is set to 'Fixed Percentage'
pdf-pager.actorType.Name: Actor: '{name}'
pdf-pager.actorType.Hint: Define the PDF CODE of the PDF page to be used when selecting 'Show in PDF' from the Actor context menu for '{name}' actors
pdf-pager.itemType.Name: Item: '{name}'
pdf-pager.itemType.Hint: Define the PDF CODE of the PDF page to be used when selecting 'Show in PDF' from the Item context menu for '{name}' items
pdf-pager.actorSheet.Name: Actor Sheet: '{name}'
pdf-pager.actorSheet.Hint: Choose the PDF file to be used for a '{name}' Actor
pdf-pager.itemSheet.Name: Item Sheet: '{name}'
pdf-pager.itemSheet.Hint: Choose the PDF file to be used for a '{name}' Item

inspector.help1: You may leave this window open and return the sheet to your system sheet if you so wish. The window will refresh every 10 seconds to reflect changes made to the actor, but you may also refresh it manually with the 'Refresh' button located on the header.
inspector.help2: You should be very careful when using these data paths in a PDF. The color coding is a 'best guess', and while it will usually be correct some systems may have exceptions or cause changes you enter into the sheet to be overridden by the system for certain data paths.
inspector.help3: While the button to copy /roll syntax is provided for convenience, data may be purposefully omitted or changed by the system during a roll. If a /roll syntax does not produce the expected result, this is not a bug.

DANGER.Safe: This path is likely to be safe to use.
DANGER.Low: This path is unlikely to be dangerous, but you should use caution.
DANGER.High: This path is very likely to cause issues if used.
DANGER.Critical: You should never use this path under any circumstances!
